import re

def replace_emails(text):
    email_regex = ''
    result = re.sub(email_regex, 'EMAIL', text)
    return result

import re

def replace_emails(text):
    email_regex = '\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\\b'
    result = re.sub(email_regex, '', text)
    return result
